alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued May 26 at 2:01PM PDT until May 26 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...For Today and Friday: Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Topaz, Bridgeport, Mono, and Crowley. * WHEN...For the first Lake Wind Advisory, until 11 PM PDT this evening. For the second Lake Wind Advisory, from 11 AM to 11 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.
